name: Chat Bubble - Chaindesk: Train Your Chatbot in Minutes
description: Train a chatbot with your data on Chaindesk platform. Paste your data to train the bot. Add HTML snippet to go live! Stay updated with auto-sync.

features.name: Just paste your website url
features.description:
We automatically get your website pages.
Other data sources are available too 
(e.g. PDF, Gdoc, Sheets, Notion, Airtable, etc...)

features.name: Training
features.description: After collecting your data, we process it and train your bot. Don’t worry, it’s fast ⚡️

features.name: Copy/Paste the HTML snippet
features.description:
The final step is to the widget on your website. 
Just add the generated HTML code to your website

features.name: Auto Sync
features.description:
We keep the bot up to date with your data. 
We automatically synch your data when possible.
 You can also setup a webhook or manually trigger a synch.

name: No-Code Webpage - Chaindesk: Create & Share Your Bot's Page
description: Generate a dedicated web page for your Agent, connect a custom domain and share it with your audience

features.name: Just paste your website url
features.description:
We automatically get your website pages.
Other data sources are available too 
(e.g. PDF, Gdoc, Sheets, Notion, Airtable, etc...)

features.name: Training
features.description: After collecting your data, we process it and train your bot. Don’t worry, it’s fast ⚡️

features.name: Setup bot handle
features.description: Your bot webpage will be available at https://chaindesk.ai/@your-bot-handle

name: Chat Assistant by Chaindesk - Chat with Your Data
description: Chatbot assistant offers a seamless chat experience. Easily create a Datastore, upload your files, and interact in real-time. Stay updated with auto-sync.

features.name: Create a Datastore
features.description: A Datastore is a kind of database that can hold any type of data (PDFs, Gdocs, Sheets, Notion, Airtable, etc...)

features.name: Add your data
features.description: Upload documents, link your Google Drive, connect to Notion and more!

features.name: Chat
features.description: You can ask questions, get summaries, find information, and more.

features.name: Auto Sync
features.description:
We keep the bot up to date with your data. 
We automatically synch your data when possible.
 You can also setup a webhook or manually trigger a synch.

name: ChatGPT Bot for Slack with Chaindesk: Elevate Your Workspace
description: Deploy a custom Chaindesk bot to your Slack workspace in minutes. Train with your company data, install the Slack plugin, and enjoy AI-driven interactions.

features.name: Just paste your website url
features.description:
We automatically get your website pages.
Other data sources are available too 
(e.g. PDF, Gdoc, Sheets, Notion, Airtable, etc...)

features.name: Training

features.name: Install Slack plugin
features.description:
The final step is to install Chaindesk Bot to your Slack workspace. 
Now your workspace is spiced up 
with some AI magic ✨

features.name: Auto Sync
features.description:
We keep the bot up to date with your data. 
We automatically synch your data when possible.
 You can also setup a webhook or manually trigger a synch.

name: Resolve your Zendesk support tickets instantly
description: With our Zendesk integration you can automatically resolve tickets and provide instant support to your customers.

features.name: AI Agent trained on your data
features.description: Train your Agent with custom data with our easy to use interface. Get started in minutes!

features.name: Smart Human Handoff
features.description: When a human operator is requested, the AI will create a new ticket in Zendesk containing the email of the visitor.

features.name: Resolve Tickets instantly
features.description: When the conversation is marked as resolved, the AI will close the ticket in Zendesk automatically!
